correctness.rationale: Largely incorrect and not schema-compliant. Only a few items are traceable (reactor F-120 by Microchemistry; ZnO via ZnCl2+H2O; sapphire substrate; substrate temperature ~500 °C; AFM RMS roughness ~0.16–0.4 nm). Major issues: (1) Many values are fabricated/not reported in the article: pressure (1 mmHg), growth-per-cycle (0.3 Å), number of cycles (1000), film thickness (300 nm), saturation, nucleation period (10 cycles), dosing/purge times (1 ms), flow rates (10 SCM/min), refractive index (2.0), band gap (3.3 eV), absorption coefficient, all electrical properties (resistivity, carrier density, mobility), uniformity (5%), conformality (AR 10), elemental concentration (50%) and Zn:O=1:1 by XRD, film density (5.6 in g/dm3), and all device/TFT metrics; none are given in the paper. (2) Crystallinity set to "monocrystalline" conflicts with the text for ZnO on sapphire (polycrystalline; best films on GaN/sapphire are crystalline with smooth steps). (3) Misuse of characterization methods: XRD cannot provide elemental concentration/atomic ratio as entered; PL listed as band gap method is not reported. (4) Semantic incoherence: aldMethod includes ZnSe while materialDeposited is ZnO (mixes processes); carrier/purging gas nitrogen is not explicitly stated for ZnO in this work. (5) Schema violations/quality issues: presence of nulls (plasmaPower: null; supercycleDesign: null) violates the no-null requirement and likely the schema typing; supercycleDesign appears nested under processParameters (wrong location per schema); many fields contain untraceable or duplicate information. Properties to correct/review: remove null fields; restrict aldMethod to ZnO only; update crystallinity to match substrate (polycrystalline on sapphire) with XRD/AFM as methods; delete or mark as not reported all unsupported parameters (pressure, GPC, cycles, thickness, dosing/purge/flows, saturation, nucleation, optical and electrical metrics, uniformity, conformality, composition, density, device properties); ensure all remaining values are traceable to the article and use schema-valid units.

completeness.rationale: The extraction is largely incomplete and contains many untraceable or incorrect values relative to the article and multiple schema issues. Missing processes: the article reports several ZnO ALE variants (Zn + O2 at ~480 °C; ZnCl2 + H2O at ~500 °C; ZnCl2 + O2 at ~480 °C) and multiple substrates (sapphire, GaN/sapphire, glass, SiO2/Si). Only one ZnO process is extracted; the others are omitted, and no separate processes are provided. Unreported/fabricated parameters: GPC, number of cycles, film thickness (300 nm), dosing/purge times (1 ms), flow rates (10 sccm), pressure (1 mTorr), saturation, nucleation period, uniformity, conformality, refractive index, absorption coefficient, band gap (3.3 eV), electrical properties (Hall data), elemental concentrations/atomic ratio, film density, and device metrics are not given in the article and are thus not traceable. Inconsistencies: thicknessControl is self-inconsistent (0.3 Å × 1000 cycles ≠ 300 nm); crystallinity is set to monocrystalline while the chosen substrate (sapphire) yields polycrystalline ZnO per the article; aldMethod lists ZnSe though this process instance deposits ZnO; carrier/purging gas (N2) is only explicitly stated for ZnSe, not for ZnO. Schema violations: plasmaPower is set to null (type mismatch); supercycleDesign is placed under processParameters and set to null (additionalProperties false and wrong location); multiple numeric units/values are implausible (e.g., film density unit/result) or unsupported by the text. To improve completeness, extract distinct processes for each ZnO chemistry/substrate reported and populate only values explicitly stated (reactor F-120/Microchemistry; substrate and temperatures; precursors/co-reactants; roughness 0.16–0.4 nm; qualitative crystallinity per substrate). Remove or correct fabricated values and fix schema violations (omit null fields, place properties per schema, ensure unit consistency).
